name: THE COW GAME
description:
This game was made during the 48 h Franken Game Jam 2020 (Theme: "Anticipation"). It is about a caring mother and its beloved child. 

It is strongly recommended that you use hearphones since there is a "Baby's Call" mechanic!

There are going to be two versions of the game. The Game Jam Game Version ("TheCowGame"), unpolished and what we achieved during these 48 hours, and the upcoming polished version, which will receive updates. Enjoy playing!

Features 
  • Explore the low-poly forest
  • Move stones and objects to overcome obstacles
  • Find your way to the farmhouse
  • Playtime ~ 15 minutes
Controls

WASD to move

Left Mouse Button to call for your child

Standard Mouse Control to look around
